tests package¶

Submodules¶

tests.test_integration module¶

class tests.test_integration.TestMorsePalindromeIntegration(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: TestCase

Integration tests for the MorseConverter and PalindromeChecker classes.

setUp() → None¶

Initialize MorseConverter and PalindromeChecker for testing integration.

test_empty_input() → None¶

Test the response to an empty input string.

test_morse_palindrome_integration_complex() → None¶

Test complex phrases that are palindromes when non-alphanumeric characters are removed.

test_morse_palindrome_integration_negative() → None¶

Test that a non-palindrome phrase correctly converts to Morse code and is identified as not a palindrome.

test_morse_palindrome_integration_positive() → None¶

Test that a known palindrome phrase correctly converts to Morse code and is identified as a palindrome.

tests.test_morse_converter module¶

class tests.test_morse_converter.TestMorseConverter(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: TestCase

Unit tests for the MorseConverter class.

setUp() → None¶

Create an instance of MorseConverter that can be used in all tests.

test_morse_to_text() → None¶

Test converting Morse code back to text.

test_text_to_morse_empty_string() → None¶

Test converting an empty string to Morse code.

test_text_to_morse_with_alphanumeric() → None¶

Test converting alphanumeric text to Morse code.

test_text_to_morse_with_non_alphanumeric() → None¶

Test that non-alphanumeric characters are ignored during conversion.

tests.test_palindrome_checker module¶

class tests.test_palindrome_checker.TestPalindromeChecker(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: TestCase

Unit tests for the PalindromeChecker class.

setUp() → None¶

Create an instance of MorseConverter and PalindromeChecker that can be used in all tests.

test_is_morse_palindrome_empty_string() → None¶

Test Morse code palindrome check with an empty string.

test_is_morse_palindrome_false() → None¶

Test Morse code palindrome check with a string that is not a palindrome.

test_is_morse_palindrome_true() → None¶

Test Morse code palindrome check with a string that is a palindrome.

test_is_morse_palindrome_with_non_alphanumeric() → None¶

Test Morse code palindrome check ignoring non-alphanumeric characters.
